abilities.name: Stall Tactics
abilities.info: ACTION: Discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Scheming
abilities.info: When you draw 1 or more action cards, draw 1 additional action card.  Then, choose and discard 1 action card from your hand.

abilities.name: Crafty
abilities.info: You can have any number of action cards in your hand.  Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

promissory_note.name: Spy Net
promissory_note.info: At the start of your turn: Look at the Yssaril player's hand of action cards.  Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand. Then, return this card to the Yssaril player.

technologies.name: Transparasteel Plating
technologies.info: During your turn of the action phase, players that have passed cannot play action cards. Requirements: 1 Green

technologies.name: MageonImplants
technologies.info: ACTION: Exhaust this card to look at another player's hand of action cards.  Choose 1 of those cards and add it to your hand.Requirements: 3 Green

flagship.name: Y'sia Y'ssrila
abilities: This ship can move through systems that contain other player's ships.

quote: Clever Ssruu has met the offworlder and made it dead. What does the Guild want for Ssruu to meet next?.
